item.title: Her Home Destroyed by Hurricane Katrina, She Found Her 'Zen' 150 Miles Away
item.description: Renee Brown’s path to owning this Queen Anne Victorian in southern Louisiana was anything but easy.

item.title: Comb-Over No More: Why Men's Hair Transplants Are Flourishing
item.description: Via (often painful) surgical procedures costing up to $15,000, more men are using Covid-era downtime to “grow” new thatches.

item.title: Hudson Valley Weekend Trips: Where to Find the Region's Best New Restaurants, Hotels and Kombucha Sorbet
item.description: New York’s Hudson River Valley has been transformed by upstart boutiques, upcycling and handcrafted everything. These three weekend itineraries let you sample it all, from reimagined hotels to weirdly wonderful food.

item.title: Wines That Entertain as Well as Impress
item.description: At a time of year when people are looking for light wines, our wine columnist went out in search of the lighthearted. While these wines may have silly names, they’re no lightweights in terms of quality.

item.title: Humidifiers vs Dehumidifiers vs Purifiers: Which One Do I Actually Need?
item.description: Whether you’re prepping for wildfire season, trying to get your allergies under control or just looking for relief from dry skin, one of these devices can help.

item.title: Can Inflatable Outdoor Furniture Ever Be Chic?
item.description: Some design pros say today’s patio-ready bubble chairs and blow-up chaises are a fresh take on a pop classic. Others say they’re just too tween. We let them duke it out.

item.title: You Won't Find Artwork Hanging From the Walls of This Rustic Italian Farmhouse
item.description: For the homeowners, who spent about $3.9 million buying and transforming the property, the beauty is in the views.

item.title: Curb Appeal, Schmurb Appeal. These Buyers Didn't Care About the Home's Exterior.
item.description: They overlooked what was on the outside for ideal interiors, a desirable neighborhood and in some cases, a good deal.

item.title: The Story Behind This Fort Lauderdale Home Begins With a Naked Guy
item.description: The Tuckmans planned to build a waterfront home, until they came face to flesh with a nudist neighbor. So they purchased a new plot of land and ended up with this house.

item.title: Cher Wants $85 Million for Her Venice-Inspired Malibu Home
item.description: The singer and actress says the Italian Renaissance-style house took nearly five years to build.
